front.title: Link Management Protocol (LMP) Test Messages Extensions for Evolutive Optical Transport Networks (OTN)

abstract.t: This document specifies Link Management Protocol (LMP) extensions for the support of enhanced Optical Transport Networks (OTN). In particular it updates LMP test messages detailing the ITU-T G.709 OTN technology specific information and extends them in order to cover also recently introduced signal types and containers defined by the ITU-T.
